Continental Europe, Luxembourg","subAdvisor":"HSBC Global Asset Management (UK) Ltd","inceptionDate":"2010-07-28","investmentObjectiveAndStrategy":"The sub-fund invests for high income primarily in a diversified portfolio of higher yielding fixed income bonds and other similar securities from around the world denominated in a range of currencies, while promoting ESG characteristics within the meaning of Article 8 of SFDR. The sub-fund aims to do this with a higher ESG rating than the Bloomberg Global Aggregate Corporate USD Hedged (the “Reference Benchmark”), calculated as a weighted average of the ESG ratings of the issuers of the sub-fund’s investments, versus the weighted average of the ESG ratings of the Reference Benchmark constituents. The weighted averages of the ESG ratings for both the sub-fund and Reference Benchmark will be calculated at sub-fund and asset class level, which enables the sub-fund’s ESG performance to be evaluated at sub-fund or asset class level.","hsbcCategoryCode":"GO","hsbcCategoryName":"Global Fixed Income","dividendYield":6.24706,"distributionFrequency":"Monthly","riskLvlCde":"3","currency":"USD","expenseRatio":null,"marginRatio":70,"initialCharge":2,"annualManagementFee":1.25,"assetsUnderManagement":791027651,"assetsUnderManagementCurrencyCode":"USD","topPerformersIndicator":null,"topSellProdIndex":"Y","investmentRegionCode":"GL","investmentRegionName":"Global","channelRestrictList":["SI_I"],"fundClassCde":"WIC","amcmIndicator":"Y","nextDealDate":"2025-08-13","surveyedFundNetAssetsDate":"2025-08-12","riskFreeRateName":"USTREAS T-Bill Auction Ave 3 Mon","relativeRiskMeasuresIndexName":"Morningstar Gbl Core Bd GR Hdg USD","dayEndBidOfferPricesDate":null,"dayEndNAVDate":"2025-08-12","prodStatCde":"A","allowBuy":"Y","allowSell":"Y","allowSwInProdInd":"Y","allowSwOutProdInd":"Y","allowSellMipProdInd":"Y","annualReportDate":"2025-03-31","piFundInd":null,"deAuthFundInd":null,"weekRangeLowDate":"2025-04-09","weekRangeHighDate":"2024-09-24"}}}
